operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: List all the subnets in a given container
operation.parameter: container in which we want to query the subnets
operation.statusCode: User not authorized to perform this operation
The containerName passed was not found
Service unavailable

operation.name: GET
operation.documentation: List the configuration of a subnet in a given container
operation.parameter: container in which we want to query the subnet
operation.statusCode: User not authorized to perform this operation
The containerName or subnetName passed was not found
Service unavailable

operation.name: PUT
operation.documentation: Add a subnet into the specified container context, node connectors are optional
operation.parameter: name of the container context in which the subnet needs to be added
name of new subnet to be added

inValue.documentation: the SubnetConfig structure in request body

operation.statusCode: Subnet created successfully
Invalid data passed
User not authorized to perform this operation
Subnet name in url conflicts with name in request body
Container name passed was not found or subnet config is null
Internal Server Error: Addition of subnet failed
Service unavailable

operation.name: DELETE
operation.documentation: Delete a subnet from the specified container context
operation.parameter: name of the container in which subnet needs to be removed
name of new subnet to be deleted

outValue.documentation:
Response as dictated by the HTTP Response Status code 
Example:

Request URL:
http://localhost:8080/controller/nb/v2/subnetservice/default/subnet/engdepartment

operation.statusCode: No Content
User not authorized to perform this operation
The containerName passed was not found
Internal Server Error : Removal of subnet failed
Service unavailable

operation.name: POST
operation.documentation: Modify a subnet. Replace the existing subnet with the new specified one. For now only port list modification is allowed. If the respective subnet configuration does not exist this call is equivalent to a subnet creation.
operation.parameter: Name of the subnet to be modified

inValue.documentation: the SubnetConfig structure in request body parameter

operation.statusCode: Configuration replaced successfully
User not authorized to perform this operation
Subnet name in url conflicts with name in request body
The containerName or subnetName is not found
Internal server error: Modify subnet failed
Service unavailable

group.name: SubnetsNorthbound
group.documentation:
This class provides REST APIs to manage subnets.

Authentication scheme : HTTP Basic
Authentication realm : opendaylight
Transport : HTTP and HTTPS

HTTPS Authentication is disabled by default.
